session.objective: Apply evidence-based testing philosophy to agent system per issue #749

serenaMemoryUpdated.evidence: Updated testing-004-coverage-pragmatism with Dan North/Rico Mariani foundations and risk-based tiers

scopedMarkdownlintRun.evidence: Pre-commit hook runs markdownlint on staged .md files

allChangesCommitted.evidence: All changes committed including session log

workLog.description: Reviewed v0.3.0 PLAN.md and identified next work item
workLog.outcome: Chains 1-3 complete. #778 and #836 already fixed by Validate-SessionJson.ps1 rewrite. Selected #749 as next item.

workLog.description: Updated qa agent prompt with evidence-based testing criteria
workLog.outcome: Added risk-tiered coverage targets and Dan North evaluation criteria to .agents/AGENT-SYSTEM.md qa section

workLog.description: Updated implementer agent guidance with security coverage targets
workLog.outcome: Added security-critical 100% coverage requirement with code categories to implementer section
Created .agents/governance/TESTING-ANTI-PATTERNS.md with 5 anti-patterns including detection and correction

workLog.description: Added testing quality checklist to session protocol
workLog.outcome: Added checklist to Phase 2.5 QA Validation in .agents/SESSION-PROTOCOL.md
Added philosophical foundations, security context, and governance cross-reference

decisions: Selected #749 over #778 and #836 because both bugs were already fixed by Validate-SessionJson.ps1 rewrite (PR #830)
Used three-tier coverage model: 100% security-critical, 80% business logic, 60-70% read-only/docs
Documented 5 anti-patterns: coverage theater, brittle mocks, unit-tests-only, quality-for-quantity, testing-after-the-fact

learnings.insight: Issues #778 and #836 reference Validate-Session.ps1 code that was replaced by Validate-SessionJson.ps1 in PR #830. Both should be closed as resolved.
learnings.application: Check codebase state before starting work on bug issues; the code may have been refactored.
